title: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not retain filter information when it should.
OB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should retain filter information after it has been applied. Users should be able to use a plain XPath expression (prepended with the path from the data set selector) and still have the filtering information persist for those who need it.
SR:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Apply a filter using a plain XPath expression (prepended with the path from the data set selector).
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog and verify if the filter information is still present.
